TEXT.TITLE: GENENTECH <GENE> SAYS FDA TO REVIEW TPA
TEXT.BODY: Genentech Inc said Activase, its tissue plasminogen activator, will be reviewed at the a regularly scheduled May 29 meeting of the Food and Drug Administration's cardiorenal advisory committee. Reuter
